title: "Peanuts," Franklin and Representation in Cartoons - Beyond the Scenes
itunes:title: "Peanuts," Franklin and Representation in Cartoons - Beyond the Scenes
description:
"JumpStart" comic creator, Robb Armstrong, discusses the impact of the Black "Peanuts" character Franklin with Roy Wood Jr. and The Daily Show writer Josh Johnson.
